name: Core Banking Restart Procedure
description: Step-by-step procedure for restarting core banking application tier
procedure_steps: 1. Notify on-call DBA; 2. Drain connections; 3. Restart app servers; 4. Validate health checks; 5. Notify stakeholders

name: Mobile App Rollback Procedure
description: Procedure for rolling back mobile app to previous production version
procedure_steps: 1. Raise emergency change; 2. Revert load balancer routing; 3. Validate previous version; 4. Monitor for 30 mins

name: Payments Failover Procedure
description: Procedure for failing payments processing to DR site
procedure_steps: 1. Declare incident; 2. Activate DR; 3. Reroute payment traffic; 4. Validate transactions; 5. Communicate to business
